titles.title: Used Oil Recycling Act of 1988
A bill to protect the used oil recycling system and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Transportation, Tourism, and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 10/12/1988--Introduced. Used Oil Recycling Act of 1988 - Amends the Solid Waste Disposal Act to prohibit the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency from listing or identifying recycled used oil as a hazardous waste under such Act. Directs the Administrator to propose management standards, within 180 days of this Act's enactment, governing the storage, transportation, and processing of recycled used oil.
